bibl.title: Little Horror Stories in an Oxyrhynchus Papyrus: A Re-Edition and Commentary of P.Oxy. II 218.
Archiv für Papyrusforschung und verwandte Gebiete

bibl.note: P. Oxy. II, 218 (= M.-P.3 2184; LDAB 5303) [reedition and commentary.] - The funerary ritual and the resurection of the guilty priest of Ares. - The nature of the text. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Irene Pajón Leyra, Little Horror Stories in an Oxyrhynchus Papyrus: A Re-Edition and Commentary of P.Oxy. II 218.
P. Oxy. II, 218 (= M.-P.3 2184; LDAB 5303) [reedition and commentary.] - The funerary ritual and the resurection of the guilty priest of Ares. - The nature of the text. - Avec résumé en anglais.
